Reviews.Title: Good Value !
Reviews.Author: Stephen M.
Reviews.Content: Had to buy a cheap smart phone phone because I broke my Samsung Galaxy and was going to have to pay full price to replace it, (over 600 $). I have been very impressed with this phone. Does most everything the other phone did for less than half the money.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: jeffrey radtke
Reviews.Content: Great phone and with the case I bought for it it is indestructable. Perfect size I recommend it very highly

Reviews.Title: Really Nice!
Reviews.Author: JoJo
Reviews.Content: Nice phone at a nice price! You do not have to get a contract and can put it on prepaid which now offers $50.00 Unlimited Everything.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money......
Reviews.Author: PAULETTA KING
Reviews.Content: This actually exceded my expectations comparing it to other android phones I've had. It does everyything I need it to do with some extras! I'm loving the on homescreen memo, comes in handy when I don't have time to open a memo app. Would give it 5 stars if I could set my unwanted callers to go voicemail which was an option with other phones I've had.

Reviews.Title: Definitely Keeper, Quality Stuff
Reviews.Author: SkyGlass
Reviews.Content: This is a phone I considered buying to replace my old flip phone. One of the things that I liked about it is that it’s a no contract phone. Primarily, I was just looking for a phone for basic voice and text and a little bit of browsing. Secondly, I wanted to play casual games. In reality, I would have been OK with another flip phone. So when I saw this phone, I wasn’t sure I wanted to upgrade to a smartphone. Getting a data plan was not in my budget.Recently though, I was thinking that having data services might be good. Everything’s available on the web. And if I needed to search for something on the web, I would need a smartphone. To make a long story short, I decided that this phone was the tops and met all my needs.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Andrea Paul
Reviews.Content: phone was what was described it works great got it in a reasonable time frame from when it was paid for!

Reviews.Title: Completely Satisfied;; just wish it jad swype lol
Reviews.Author: Tiffany Roseblock
Reviews.Content: It arrived in perfect condition, manual, phone, battery and wall charger. I had no trouble with it at all I love this phone! The only thing I have to get use to is keying every letter out because the LG Splendor doesnt offer the swype mode for text.

Reviews.Title: Overall satisfied with the LG Splendor
Reviews.Author: sara campbell
Reviews.Content: I wish that it had the voice to text option but I love the size of the screen and the over all set up of the phone. I would recommend it to other pre-paid customers

Reviews.Title: i.love.it
Reviews.Author: mo nitram
Reviews.Content: I love it I highly recommend this phone. Great service, I think it is better than a iphone. I love it
